column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Korean man was drunk behind the wheel of a Hyundai car and plowed into a tuk tuk.------The incident occurred at 11:10 pm on September 25
column5: 2018 at the Depot Market Stops along street 215 / 182 in Phsar Depot 1
column6: Khan Toul Kork.------According to a source from the scene
column7: Ying-Jeou  a drunken Korean man in a Hyundai  plated 2AL-0760
column9: when a tuk tuk coming from 182 was hit.------the tuk tuk driver suffered head injuries and was taken away by ambulance.  Immediately
column10: the driver was handed over to local authorities.------After the incident
column11: the scene was surveyed and the vehicles taken the Phnom Penh Road Traffic Police Office for legal action.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/374031------ ------ ------
